user_css.help: Set the user CSS stylesheet. This can be used to customize the look of all books.

max_fs_width.help: Set the maximum width that the book's text and pictures will take when in fullscreen mode. This allows you to read the book text without it becoming too wide.

max_fs_height.help: Set the maximum height that the book's text and pictures will take when in fullscreen mode. This allows you to read the book text without it becoming too tall. Note that this setting only takes effect in paged mode (which is the default mode).

fit_images.help: Resize images larger than the viewer window to fit inside it

search_online_url.help: The URL to use when searching for selected text online

remember_current_page.help: Save the current position in the document, when quitting

copy_bookmarks_to_file.help: Copy bookmarks to the ebook file for easy sharing, if possible

wheel_flips_pages.help: Have the mouse wheel turn pages

wheel_scroll_fraction.help: Control how much the mouse wheel scrolls by in flow mode

line_scroll_fraction.help: Control how much the arrow keys scroll by in flow mode

tap_flips_pages.help: Tapping on the screen turns pages

line_scrolling_stops_on_pagebreaks.help: Prevent the up and down arrow keys from scrolling past page breaks

page_flip_duration.help: The time, in seconds, for the page flip animation. Default is half a second.

font_magnification_step.help: The amount by which to change the font size when clicking the font larger/smaller buttons. Should be a number between 0 and 1.

fullscreen_clock.help: Show a clock in fullscreen mode.

fullscreen_pos.help: Show reading position in fullscreen mode.

fullscreen_scrollbar.help: Show the scrollbar in fullscreen mode.

start_in_fullscreen.help: Start viewer in full screen mode

default_font_size.help: The standard font size in px

mono_font_size.help: The monospace font size in px

minimum_font_size.help: The minimum font size in px

synopsis_extension.help: The extension for the synopsis file

synopsis_size.help: Remember the synopsis size and layout
